This is Quite a differant kind of Animation. It is the Sequal of one of the biggest adult anime releases of all time. Bible Black,It starts out with a satanic ritual and There is a lot of witch craft and explicit sex! Also there is bloody violence and lots of hentai! This is about a satanic cult that has controll,untill,one caractor Imari who becomes a member of the special police unit created to solve the supernatural cases that are going on. Also Miss Kitami who is a leader of the evil group has kidnapped a virginal Aki that she uses for her evil ceremonies. One of the caractors Mrs. Takashiro who was into the evil cerimonies now is a Nun she was once a part of the evil cult group she manages to stop the evil spells that are being cast on others with help from a Teacher. But it keeps on going with lots of Rape and Violance. You are also able to pause the DVD anytime it plays for about an hour also fast forwards,rewinds or jumps to another sceen with no proublems. This Dvd has a clear picture and is in full screen.

If your viewing reviews to get an idea if these Bible Black DVD are worth getting so you could finally see them all after getting a taste of them off the Net then I would recommend them. For those who are wondering the aspect ratio is 4:3 or standard so its not going to fill your wide screen HD TV just to warn ya but that's really not a problem, the set up lets you choose from English Dub, English with English Subs, Japanese, and Japanese with English subs (recommended setting personally). The most important thing if your still doubting. They are uncensored so if you've only gotten a taste of these off the net and only seen parts of it censored then you'll be very happy. I also wanted to comment that the seller is wonderful. I ordered these on a Saturday and I received them on Wednesday of the following week.
Bible Black is still amazing and one of the best hentai DVDs anyone can get and must own!
